Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Vas \Vas\, n.; pl. {Vasa}. [L., a vessel. See {Vase}.] (Anat.) A vessel; a duct. [1913 Webster]
{Vas deferens}; pl. {Vasa deferentia}. [L. vas vessel + deferens carrying down.] (Anat.) The excretory duct of a testicle; a spermatic duct. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: Virtual Entity of Relevant Acronyms (Version 1.9, June 2002)

Definition.WordDefinition: vas n : a tube in which a body fluid circulates [syn: {vessel}] [also: {vasa} (pl)]
